argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lvolset.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lvolset.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 3 |  | lvolset.p | |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) |
| 4 |  | lvolset.v | |- V = ( LVols ` K ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elex | |- ( K e. A -> K e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( Base ` k ) = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( Base ` k ) = B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( LPlanes ` k ) = ( LPlanes ` K ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( LPlanes ` k ) = P ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( k = K -> ( <o ` k ) = ( <o ` K ) ) |
| 11 | 10, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( k = K -> ( <o ` k ) = C ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_breqd | |- ( k = K -> ( y ( <o ` k ) x <-> y C x ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_rexeqbidv | |- ( k = K -> ( E. y e. ( LPlanes ` k ) y ( <o ` k ) x <-> E. y e. P y C x ) ) |
| 14 | 7, 13 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( k = K -> { x e. ( Base ` k ) | E. y e. ( LPlanes ` k ) y ( <o ` k ) x } = { x e. B | E. y e. P y C x } ) |
| 15 |  | #P_df-lvols | |- LVols = ( k e. _V |-> { x e. ( Base ` k ) | E. y e. ( LPlanes ` k ) y ( <o ` k ) x } ) |
| 16 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` K ) e. _V |
| 17 | 1, 16 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 18 | 17 | #P_rabex | |- { x e. B | E. y e. P y C x } e. _V |
| 19 | 14, 15, 18 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( K e. _V -> ( LVols ` K ) = { x e. B | E. y e. P y C x } ) |
| 20 | 4, 19 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( K e. _V -> V = { x e. B | E. y e. P y C x } ) |
| 21 | 5, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( K e. A -> V = { x e. B | E. y e. P y C x } ) |
